<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstprinter">MCInstPrinter</a></>}>
This is an instance of a target assembly language printer that converts an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> to valid target assembly syntax. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstprinter/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

### printInst() {#acdec566fe6048a0230f51f82c4a7f88f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void XCoreInstPrinter::printInst (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &#42; MI, uint64&#95;t Address, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Annot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> to the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>.

<code>Address</code> the address of current instruction on most targets, used to print a PC relative immediate as the target address. On targets where a PC relative immediate is relative to the next instruction and the length of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> is difficult to measure (e.g. x86), this is the address of the next instruction. If Address is 0, the immediate will be printed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/lib/target/xcore/mctargetdesc/xcoreinstprinter-h/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/lib/target/xcore/mctargetdesc/xcoreinstprinter-h">XCoreInstPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/lib/target/xcore/mctargetdesc/xcoreinstprinter-cpp/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/lib/target/xcore/mctargetdesc/xcoreinstprinter-cpp">XCoreInstPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
